div.pre: 1477 Nea Paphus, 1964 Burial: c. 95 B.C. (M) Contents: 2484 AR. Pot hoard from excava- tions Ptolemy V-Ptolemy X: tetradr. (Alex- andreia 1251, Citium 465, Paphus 271, Salamis 497) Disposition: Nicosia BCH 1965, pp. 292 f., illus. To be published by I. Nicolaou and O.
